description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE ORDER MANAGEMENT AND PRICING CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

Oracle Pricing Manager, Oracle Order Management, Oracle Shipping, Customers, Transacting a Sales Order, Return Material Authorization, Drop Ship Sales Orders, Internal Sales Orders, Retroactive Billing and Sales Agreements
title: Oracle Applications R12 Order Management and Pricing
